scenes.background: (Monica) sighs heavily and rubs her temples. (Bob) glances at you with frustration.
scenes.description: ‘Okay, I get it, but we really need to figure this out. Any suggestions?’

options.text: Let's break down the task and see what can be delegated.
options.analysis: You offered a constructive approach to handle the situation, showing good perception and empathy, but your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I’m on leave, but maybe you can prioritize the most urgent parts and handle those first.
options.analysis: You suggested a practical solution while emphasizing your need for leave, showing strong self-regulation but less empathy.

options.text: I think you should handle this internally. It’s part of your responsibilities.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, which might impact team dynamics negatively.
